metadataFields.name: Document Type
metadataFields.description: Provide the type of document like Summary of Product Characteristics, SmPC, Product Information, Clinical Study Protocol. This information will be typically provided in the document header, title or the document name

metadataFields.name: Product Name
metadataFields.description: Identify the full name of the medicinal product as stated in the SmPC.

metadataFields.name: Active Substance(s)
metadataFields.description: Extract the name(s) of the active substance(s) present in the product.

metadataFields.name: Strength
metadataFields.description: Determine the quantitative strength of each active substance in the product.

metadataFields.name: Pharmaceutical Form
metadataFields.description: Identify the pharmaceutical form of the product (e.g., tablet, solution).

metadataFields.name: Route of Administration
metadataFields.description: Extract the method by which the product is administered (e.g., oral, intravenous).

metadataFields.name: Indications
metadataFields.description: List the therapeutic indications for which the product is authorized.

metadataFields.name: Posology
metadataFields.description: Summarize the dosage and method of administration provided in the SmPC.

metadataFields.name: Contraindications
metadataFields.description: Extract any contraindications listed in the SmPC.

metadataFields.name: Special Warnings and Precautions
metadataFields.description: Identify special warnings and precautions for use mentioned in the document.

metadataFields.name: Marketing Authorisation Holder
metadataFields.description: Extract the name of the marketing authorisation holder.

metadataFields.name: Marketing Authorisation Number
metadataFields.description: Identify the unique marketing authorisation number(s).

metadataFields.name: Date of First Authorisation
metadataFields.description: Extract the date of first marketing authorisation granted.

metadataFields.name: Date of Latest Renewal
metadataFields.description: Identify the date of the latest renewal of the marketing authorisation.

metadataFields.name: Shelf Life
metadataFields.description: Extract the stated shelf life of the medicinal product.

metadataFields.name: Storage Conditions
metadataFields.description: Summarize any specific storage conditions required for the product.

metadataFields.name: Package Description
metadataFields.description: Describe the packaging details including material and container closure system.

metadataFields.name: Legal Category
metadataFields.description: Identify the legal classification of the product (e.g., prescription only, OTC).

metadataFields.name: ATC Code
metadataFields.description: Extract the Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification code.

metadataFields.name: Manufacturers
metadataFields.description: List the names and addresses of the manufacturers involved in production.

metadataFields.name: Excipients
metadataFields.description: Extract the list of excipients included in the formulation.
